glosses: To find somebody who finds somebody else to rival
To find somebody who finds somebody else to keep up with

examples.text: Roccella klanıyla aşık attırtan kişinin cesedi deniz kenarında dün sabah bulundu.
examples.translation: The corpse of the person who found somebody who found somebody else to keep up with [the] Roccella clan was found yesterday morning at the sea shore.
